Third_Party_Tax_Code_Only_Prompt.description: Indicates whether to search for third party tax code only. If true, return third party tax code only. If false or not provided, return all tax code.

Transaction_Tax_ID_Required.description: This indicator identifies that when this Tax Code is used within a transaction, the Company must have a Transaction Tax ID defined for the country associated with the Tax Code.
